archimate:Requirement.name: PE.2.3.6c: c) minimising the risk of information leakage from electromagnetic emanation (e.g. through the use of electromagnetic shielding, such as a Faraday cage, or zoning).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
